testcase.name: Home page title and menu control
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "https://bedrockstreaming.com/".....................passed When User checks the home page title........................................passed And User sees "Solutions" tab in the menu...................................passed And User clicks on the Solutions menu.......................................passed And User clicks on the "Contact" button.....................................passed Then Contact page opens and the title is "Contact us".......................passed When User fills first name as "Ayse Nur"....................................passed And User fills last name as "TETIK".........................................passed And User fills company as "Bedrock".........................................passed And User fills job title as "QA testeuse"...................................passed And User fills email as "aysenur2044@hotmail.com"...........................passed And User fills phone as "0769290691"........................................passed And User fills message as "Hello !".........................................passed
